item1:
因为某种需求将托盘货物从立库转出
Transfer of pallet goods from the warehouse due to a certain demand
item2:
也许因为要查问题或整理货物或改变货物储存托盘等原因，将托盘货物从立库搬出
May be because of the need to check the problem or organize the goods or change the goods storage pallets, etc., remove the pallet goods from the warehouse
item4:
托盘货物在立库货架状态为库存状态
Pallet article are in inventory status
item5:
托盘货物储存数据
Pallet article storage data
输出
item6:
搬运命令
Transfer out command
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的拣配数据，系统将提示查无可用拣配信息，用户可执行Data Inquire-->Q080 Inventory Data Query作业查询托盘数据；
If there is no matching picking data, the system will prompt to check that no picking information is available, and the user can perform Data Inquire-> Q080 Inventory Data Query to query the tray data;
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件后点选Query查询托盘明细清单
Enter query conditions and click Query
2. 选择要出库的托盘，点选功能菜单Execute产生出库搬运命令
Select the pallet to be transfer out, click the function menu Execute to generate the transfer out command
3. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click the function menu Refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state.
4. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu Exit or close the window to end this operation
后置条件
item9:
WCS执行出库搬运命令后由人工执行P070 Pallet Inventory Adjustment重新绑定货物与托盘关系
After WCS executes the out-of-warehousing command, P070 Pallet Inventory Adjustment is performed manually to rebind the relationship between the goods and the pallet.
备注
item10: 5.4. P070 Pallet Inventory Adjustment托盘库存调整
